Class ExpressionNode

java.lang.Object
  ExpressionNode

public abstract class ExpressionNode
extends java.lang.Object

ExpressionNode is the super class of all node, contains attributes and methods that every nodes need

Field Summary
protected  int height
           
protected  java.lang.String operand
           
protected  double x
           
protected  double y
           
 
Constructor Summary
ExpressionNode(int height)
          When node is created, its will initial the height, and values of x and y into attribute (instance variable)
 
Method Summary
 void generateOperand(double x, double y)
          When the node deep into the leaf node, its will select one value of x and y for create an expression, select by random value between 0 and 1, inclusive then keep that value (x or y) to operand (use when user aks for) and assign to the variable name 'value' for use to generate expression
 double getOperand(double x, double y)
          get the current value of operand
abstract  double getResult(double x, double y)
           
abstract  java.lang.String toString()
